'''Christina Wald''' (b. [[28 September]] [[1968]]) is an American artist who created art for role-playing games, card games, periodicals (such as [[Dragon Magazine]]) and children's books. She combines traditional, acrylic painting with digital methods. [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] contracted her to make artwork for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=Wald, Christina Suzanna}}, pp. 252-253</ref>
